name: European Lime Association
membership:
IMA-Europe, Rue des deux eglises 26, 1000 Bruxelles
CEPS, think tank
goal:
Promoting the interests of the European lime industry on all non- commercial issues of common concern, such as sustainable development, product legislation, energy, climate change, environmental protection, health and safety and communication.
Providing the members with a single voice and competent assistance to address the complex legislative framework on scientifically and technically-sound dossiers.
Ensuring that the lime industry at large benefits from the sharing of non-sensitive information and play a supporting role in the promotion of best practices particularly on health and safety.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
- ETS
- Climate and energy 2030-2015
- Waste incineration BREF revision
- Energy Union/ Internal market
- IED, next CLM BREF revision
- Energy Taxation
- Sustainable development goals
